page.title: 02LOCAL DEVELOPMENT.
page.content: At present the following local plan has been prepared by the North Wilts District Council and contains propsals which are expected to be implemented within the next ten years in the village of Luckington. These are the areas proposed for residential development. Land in the vicinity of the South End Farm, the Street, Luckington. Land at Avon Rise, Luckington. Land to the South of White House,Luckington. Land between the Street and the playing field. The building site at Avon Rise could provide an ideal opportunity for lower cost housing.The village is within the Cotswold Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty, this development would fit into the village. There is local opposition to this plan.
